verses.name: 1 Kings 7:36
verses.text: For on the plates of the ledges thereof, and on the borders thereof, he graved cherubims, lions, and palm trees, according to the proportion of every one, and additions round about.

verses.name: 1 Kings 7:37
verses.text: After this manner he made the ten bases: all of them had one casting, one measure, and one size.

verses.name: 1 Kings 7:38
verses.text: Then made he ten lavers of brass: one laver contained forty baths: and every laver was four cubits: and upon every one of the ten bases one laver.
